taskDescription: How many of the α-amino acids shown in Table 26.1 contain aromatic rings? How many contain sulfur? How many contain alcohol groups? How many contain hydrocarbon side chains?
detailedSolution: Aromatic: Phe, Tyr, Trp, His; sulfur-containing: Cys, Met; alcohols: Ser, Thr; hydrocarbon side chains: Ala, Ile, Leu, Val, Phe
